name: Special Delivery (itch) (Rezioz)
description:
/!\please if you are having some slowdown on the web version, download an executable, it will run much better/!\

A very short game (and rather mediocre, due to the developpement conditions) where you play as a delivery person tying to not finnish as a homeless guy, which is not very easy since lots of people will try to steal his package and money.
